name: RoBro (SooD)
description:
You are RoBro, a dismantled robot stashed in a repair facility. Reassemble your self and find your way out. Every part you reattach will let you progress further.

Our submission for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Controls:

  • WSAD to move around
  • Mouse to look
  • E to Attach/Detach
  • Q to Repair/Pickup/Drop

Credits:

Saurabh Sood - Programming
Shubham Dholu - Level Design
Sanjit Kumar - Sounds & Music
B. Mohamad - Graphics & Visuals
